last_episode_to_air.name: The Grandmaster
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kim returns from Japan with her sensei, Tomo, who’s interested in hiring Rudy for a position at the prestigious Otai.

name: Kickin' It
overview: Run by Sensei Rudy, the Bobby Wasabi Martial Arts Academy is the worst dojo in the nationwide Bobby Wasabi chain and is in danger of closing. But things change when Jack reluctantly joins the dojo and meets his new crew, including tough guy slacker Jerry and confident martial arts expert Kim. The crew teaches a group of neighborhood goofballs about life, karate, and how to "kick it." Jack and the gang quickly realize their newfound friendship will take them places they've never imagined and, united, they can become unstoppable.

episodes.name: Wasabi Warriors
episodes.overview: In Seaford High school the new kid ,Jack meets three boys, Jerry, Eddie and Milton and a girl named Kim. They all do karate and Jack joins Jerry, Eddie, and Milton at lunch, and soon are picked on by Red belts in the Black Dragon Dojo and Jack tries to settle things and gets in a fight with kids from the rival dojo, the Black Dragons, that at the time, Kim was a member of the Black Dragons. Jerry Eddie and Milton learn from their sensei Rudy that the Bobby Wasabi Martial Arts Academy is in danger of closing. So Jerry, Eddie and Milton convnce Rudy to get Jack to join after he crashes through the wall. Rudy lies to Jack and says he will go to juvie if he does not join and helps them get 2 belts. Later Rudy let his secret slip and Jack quits until he hears the disapointment of his friends. Jack joins to win the tourtement. Jack competes against Kim, but after the Sensei for the Black Dragon cheats, Kim quits and does not fight Jack. Jack does a Bobby Wasabi move to win the tournament and keep the dojo running. Also in this episode, Kim from Black Dragon changes to Bobby Wasabi`s dojo.

episodes.name: Fat Chance
episodes.overview: After Milton almost falls trying to place his spelling bee trophy next to Jack's Gymnastics trophy, he is caught by one of the janitors, who the kids eventually find out is a former sumo wrestler. After getting him fired because Milton asked to see his victory dance,and Milton defends Mr. Nakamura talking the principal by saying things he was not supposed to say, the kids decide to help get him back into wrestling by inadvertently having him wrestle the guy who cost him his title. Meanwhile, Rudy fights with Lonnie from Reptile World for a storage space in the basement of the mall, after the closing of a magic store. Lonnie gets the space but later gets crushed by Nakamura.

episodes.name: Dummy Dancing
episodes.overview: Truman, a bratty kid whose dad controls the mall's security, captures a video of Eddie practicing for the school dance with a punching dummy. In order to protect Eddie from online embarrassment, the crew bands together and uses Jack's martial arts skills and Jerry communication with dog skills to sneak into Truman's dad's office and obtain the evidence. Meanwhile, Lonnie's pet iguana eats Rudy's prized grain of rice, so they try to get it back by tricking the iguana that the seasons are changing.

episodes.name: Dojo Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: Arthur, the obnoxious son of the new mall owner, joins the Bobby Wasabi dojo, and Rudy bends over backwards to please him. But Arthur rubs everyone the wrong way, and after an altercation with Jack, Arthur's dad forces Rudy to kick Jack out of the dojo or he will bring in a wrecking ball and turn the dojo into a parking lot. Rudy proves his loyalty to Jack and the gang by chaining himself inside the dojo. Mr. Turner just brings the wrecking ball to scare them away. The gang does not leave, though, and they get to keep the dojo. Kim tries to get better stories to document on the news team.

episodes.name: Swords and Magic
episodes.overview: Milton prepares for a live-action role-playing battle (L.A.R.P.) but his friends don't want to particpate because they think it's uncool (except for Rudy who thinks it sounds like fun). But after thinking of all the things Milton has done for them, they decide to join him and show up just in time to help him beat the Dark Knights and win the game. Meanwhile, Jerry tries to impress Kelsey Vargas but keeps lying to her.

episodes.name: Road to Wasabi
episodes.overview: Rudy throws himself a birthday party, and an unprepared Jack scrambles for a gift. When Kim reveals her gift to Rudy, an autographed picture of Bobby Wasabi, Jack one-ups her and recruits the former international movie star Bobby Wasabi to make a surprise visit. Unfortunately, Rudy doesn't recognize his hero and is fired from his job after he accidentally flips Bobby. So Jack and the gang visit Bobby's mansion to convince him to rehire their sensei. Jack and Kim are with each other most of the episode, including them fighting ninjas with each other. Rudy takes a job at Reptile World to make ends meet.

episodes.name: All the Wrong Moves
episodes.overview: Jerry signs the gang up for the “Hottest Dance Crew Competition” at the mall, but quickly learns they can’t dance. Smooth (Roshon Fegan), the leader of the reigning champs, the Step Brotherz, offers Jerry a spot on his crew and he eagerly joins. But when Smooth steals Jerry’s signature dance move for the competition, Jerry realizes he betrayed his friends. Meanwhile, Rudy and Marge host an infomercial for Pocket Ninja but Rudy messes up.

episodes.name: Ricky Weaver
episodes.overview: Kim is ecstatic when teen pop sensation Ricky Weaver shows up at the dojo to ask her to dance with him onstage at his upcoming concert. But after Ricky brags to Jack about his track record with girls, Jack tries to warn Kim about Ricky’s intentions. Kim eventually realizes what a jerk Ricky is and apologizes to Jack. Throughout the episode, you can tell that Jack and Kim have feelings for each other. Meanwhile, Rudy and the rest of the gang form a boy band called the “Black Belt Boys” and try to open for Ricky Weaver.

episodes.name: Wax on, Wax off
episodes.overview: As a reward for winning the Bobby Wasabi Inter-Dojo Tournament, Bobby sends over a life-sized wax statue of himself. When a heat wave hits the town, the gang must do everything they can to prevent the statue from melting. Meanwhile, Kim and Milton turn the mall courtyard into a beach and start charging for chairs and sunblock.

episodes.name: The Commercial
episodes.overview: Rudy discovers his natural acting ability and hires Jerry as his manager, but when Rudy freaks out during the audition, Jack tries to help him out and ends up booking the lead role of Pomegranate Man. Meanwhile, Milton’s perfect GPA is threatened when a baking assignment leads him to become a crazed tyrant chef.

episodes.name: Kung Fu Cop
episodes.overview: In this dream sequence, Jack as falled asleep watching an old 'Bobby Wasabi' movie. In his dream he and the gang are in a 70's disco-styled detective movie where Jack is trying to identify the thief of the Dragon's Eye necklace. Included in the drama are the Chief (Eddie), Snowflake Jones (Kim), Bobby Wasabi (Rudy), Milty Moondust (Milton) and the snitch La Boca (Jerry).

episodes.name: Boo Gi Nights
episodes.overview: The Black Dragons want to destroy the mall’s annual Halloween Boo-Stravaganza. Jack assures the others that he’s not afraid of anything, including the Black Dragons. A Clown from Circus Burger causes Jack to flip-out showing that he does have one fear - that of clowns. Now the Dragons will stop at nothing to use that fear against him. Rudy meets a catwoman and tries to find out who she really is. We find out that she's much closer to Jerry than Rudy!

episodes.name: Clash of the Titans
episodes.overview: Milton falls for Julie but when her uncle, the head of a rival dojo, forbids them from seeing each other, they decide their feelings for each other are more important than the rivalry between their dojos. Jerry and Eddie compete to see who is the best rapper.

episodes.name: Badge of Honor
episodes.overview: Milton accidentally stops a robber in his tracks at the mall. Joan the security guard awards Milton with a badge and makes him an honorary security guard, which at first goes to Milton's head where he daydreams about being a Captain America-type hero. Reality puts Milton against a group of robbers in the dojo that have defeated all who have come against them. Milton must power-up for real to save the day. Also, Rudy wants to learn to skateboard, and it's up to Jack and Kim to teach him without killing him.

episodes.name: The Great Escape
episodes.overview: Jerry gets the blame for a prank pulled by Milton and gets a detention on the day of the big tournament his entire family is attending. Milton disguises himself as Jerry and goes to the detention where he confronts the teacher's smug attitude. Rudy has to babysit Phil's goat and develops feelings for it.

episodes.name: Dude Where's My Sword
episodes.overview: Rudy, Bobby Wasabi and Falafel Phil go on a motorcycle road trip and while they are gone the gang has a wild party in the dojo where the prized Katana sword of Rudy vanishes. While Jack, Kim and Milton search for a sword stand-in, Jerry and Eddie are tasked with cleaning up the leftover mess from the party and it looks like the mess is winning. A roadhouse brawl leaves both Rudy and Bobby felling more alive than ever and Carlotta puddy in Rudy's hands.

episodes.name: Breaking Board
episodes.overview: Jack puts Jerry in the hospital by accidentally kicking him in the chest while getting ready for a speed board breaking competition. Eddie and Milton go to visit Jerry and wind up in the maternity ward where they mix up the babies. At first Jack quits the competition but Jerry will not hear of it. And across the mall Rudy wins a free-food-for-life contest at Falafel Phil's that was rigged to be unwinable, Falafel Phil must work fast to trick him out of the winnings.

episodes.name: Reality Fights
episodes.overview: In a homage to reality shows, the gang is lured into competing in the Martial Arts reality Show, 'Wasabi Warrior' created by Bobby Wasabi who's just loving the gong. Rudy is locked into the idea when he is made the show's host. There are secret alliances formed with Jack on the inital loosing end, only to come back thanks to an eating challange failure by Jerry. In the end the gang decide to drop out together with a surprise betrayal.

episodes.name: Kickin It in China
episodes.overview: Jack enters the Junior world martial arts championships in China.and competes against his cousin Kai. Milton, Eddie and Jerry get lost after trying to find out the meaning of a fortune cookie they got.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Swan
episodes.overview: After Jack turns down Kim’s invitation to be her Ball date, she asks Brody, a new kid in school. Rudy helps Eddie with the Explorer Scout’s Pinewood Derby.

episodes.name: Rowdy Rudy
episodes.overview: Rudy flips a professional wrestler and becomes an internet sensation. Kim helps Milton when he thinks that Julie wants to kiss him.

episodes.name: Rock 'em Sock 'em Rudy
episodes.overview: Rudy must fight for his job when he is replaced as Sensei by a futuristic robot, the Wasabitron 3000. Milton and Eddie build their own robot to try to destroy it.

episodes.name: My Left Foot
episodes.overview: Milton thinks that Jack should be the new kicker for the Seaford High football team but he doesn't make it and discovers that Milton can kick the ball really well and becomes the new kicker.

episodes.name: We are Family
episodes.overview: The gang tries to save up their money to buy a go-cart that they can all share, but Jerry decides to get a job at "Meatball King" in order to buy the go-cart for himself.

episodes.name: Eddie Cries Uncle
episodes.overview: Eddie pretends that one of the Harlem Globetrotter's is his uncle.

episodes.name: Capture The Flag
episodes.overview: Eddie is selected to be the head of the float Committee. Rudy tells him that kids from Swathmore stole the flag off of his float back when he was in high school and his reputation was ruined. The gang tries to help Rudy gain his reputation back. Meanwhile a girl from Swathmore challenges Kim to a pageant.

episodes.name: It Takes Two to Tangle
episodes.overview: Rudy runs into in an old rival at a San Francisco tournament. Milton flips Jerry and thinks that he has awakened his inner voice, so he decides to become a self-help guru.

episodes.name: Buddyguards
episodes.overview: When Jack and Jerry save the lead singer of their favorite band and become his bodyguards, t they find out that one of the band members is out to get him. Rudy, Milton, and Eddie run Phil's restaurant while he is away.

episodes.name: Dojo Day Care
episodes.overview: The kids take care of the Principal's baby, but he crawls away, making them scramble to find him.

episodes.name: Indiana Eddie
episodes.overview: The gang tries to help Eddie with his dream of becoming an archeologist.

episodes.name: Kim of Kong
episodes.overview: After Jack lets Kim win in a fight, she demands a fair rematch. They fight in a virtual world in an arcade where neither of them hold back.

episodes.name: Kickin' It Old School
episodes.overview: Rudy is excited when he learns he may be elected into Seaford High's Hall of Fame, but he then realizes that he has to finish high school first.

episodes.name: The Chosen One
episodes.overview: The gang gets to train with the legendary Shaolin Warriors whose Grandmaster decides that Jerry is the chosen one destined to save the temple.

episodes.name: Hit the Road Jack
episodes.overview: When Jack is offered a scholarship to the famous Otai Academy in Japan. Kim struggles to say good bye while Rudy is overjoyed.

episodes.name: A Slip Down Memory Lane
episodes.overview: Jack is about to break the record of most boards broken by a person under the age of 15, when he slips and loses his memory.

episodes.name: Wedding Crashers
episodes.overview: The gang tries to stop Bobby Wasabi from marrying a woman with a reputation for stealing rich karate stars' fortunes.

episodes.name: Wazombie Warriors
episodes.overview: When Kim falls asleep watching a Halloween movie, she dreams that all her friends have turned into zompyres - a cross between zombies and vampires. Kim has to battle through, which is tricky, because she feels she is hurting her dearest friends - especially Jack. Her mission is to travel to Dr. Krupnick's home, (Milton is only one of her friends who isn't a zompyre) who has the only zompyre antidote.

episodes.name: Sole Brothers
episodes.overview: Jack and Jerry both start working at a shoe store in the mall, but run into trouble when Jerry is promoted to manager and Jack isn't.

episodes.name: All the President’s Friends
episodes.overview: When Milton becomes school president, he becomes the target for an embarrassing takedown.

episodes.name: New Jack City
episodes.overview: Jack feels replaced when Carson, an old friend of the gang's and Rudy's star pupil, returns to Seaford.

episodes.name: Karate Games
episodes.overview: Jack and Kim are chosen to star in a new action movie. But they discover that they are not just acting in the movie but they are also living it. Their characters are enemies but they are bought together by a kiss.

episodes.name: Oh, Christmas Nuts!
episodes.overview: Jack, Jerry and Milton are accused of stealing presents when they work with Santa at a mall.

episodes.name: Spyfall
episodes.overview: After attacking a secret agent in Phil's Restaurant, Jack has to take on the agent's role of protecting a Prince from assassination.

episodes.name: Dueling Dojos
episodes.overview: Jack takes a leadership role at the dojo when Rudy reluctantly agrees to babysit a mischievous boy for a few days. Unfortunately, Jerry has trouble adjusting to Jack's new regime.

episodes.name: Glove Hurts
episodes.overview: Milton is offered a job after creating a pair of super-strong gloves, but Jack and Jerry question the businessman's motives. Rudy and Sam visit a carnival, and Rudy is mistaken for a performer.

episodes.name: The Sub Sinker
episodes.overview: Jerry 'The Sub Sinker' Martinez proudly drives away another substitute teacher.

episodes.name: Meet the McKrupniks
episodes.overview: The gang accompanies Milton to a family reunion in Scotland; Rudy and Jerry try to take a picture of the Loch Ness Monster.

episodes.name: Witless Protection
episodes.overview: The gang witnesses a robbery and is then placed in witness protection after the crook escapes from prison and comes searching for them.

episodes.name: Jack Stands Alone
episodes.overview: Frank is blamed for kidnapping the school's beloved pet turtle and is suspended, but Jack believes that Frank is innocent.

episodes.name: Two Dates and a Funeral
episodes.overview: Someone buys a date with Kim at a charity auction, but all is not what it seems.

episodes.name: Win, Lose or Ty
episodes.overview: Rudy is forced to share his dojo with the Black Dragons.

episodes.name: Sensei & Sensibility
episodes.overview: To prove to Rudy that he's capable of moving into his own Sensei position, Jack enters a tournament only to find himself facing Rudy as a competitor.

episodes.name: Gabby's Gold
episodes.overview: Kim's gymnastics team quits on her after a humiliating loss, only a week before the big meet against Seaford's arch rivals.

episodes.name: The New Girl
episodes.overview: The dojo recruits a prized female student. Milton and Joan host an intervention for Jerry’s pathological lying.

episodes.name: Temple of Doom
episodes.overview: Milton agrees to watch the temple while the monks are out.

episodes.name: Mamma Mima
episodes.overview: When Phil's mom visits him on his birthday, he struggles to maintain the lie that he is a futon-store owner who is married with two kids.

episodes.name: Home Alone in School
episodes.overview: Jerry's latest prank at school lands an innocent Kim and Jack in weekend detention.

episodes.name: School of Jack
episodes.overview: Jack auditions to join a band to compete in a battle of the bands competition.

episodes.name: Queen of Karts
episodes.overview: Kim competes in the Seaford 500 Go Kart race but is told she can't race in the boys' division.

episodes.name: How Bobby Got His Groove Back
episodes.overview: Bobby Wasabi moves into the dojo. Milton dates a new girl.

episodes.name: Return of Spyfall
episodes.overview: Jack and Milton are invited to join an elite team of teen spies who go on secret missions.

episodes.name: Wasabi Forever
episodes.overview: Rudy explains the origin of the legendary Wasabi Code.

episodes.name: The Boys are Back in Town
episodes.overview: Jack and Milton return to Seaford and discover that Rudy has opened an impressive two-story dojo in a new mall and Phil has opened a bowling alley, and Jerry is the new manager. While Jerry faces Rudy in a bowling match after making Phil's customers go away, Jack and Milton return to Washington D.C. to stop Shane, who is revealed to be a double agent.

episodes.name: Gold Diggers
episodes.overview: Jack, Milton and Rudy discover a gold mine on Rudy's inherited seemingly worthless piece of land, But fight on who gets most of the gold. Meanwhile, Jerry helps Phil achieve the dreams he've always wanted.

episodes.name: From Zeroes to Heroes
episodes.overview: Milton, Jerry and Joan create their own highly-stylized martial arts video. Jack and Rudy take Izzy to a baseball game, but it becomes chaotic when fans try to chase him when Izzy causes Seaford to lose the chance of becoming World Champion.

episodes.name: Fight at the Museum
episodes.overview: Milton and Jerry volunteer at the Seaford History Museum in an attempt to win over the same girl but when they discover the museum is being robbed and the girl of their dreams is in danger, they have to work to save her and the museum.

episodes.name: Full Metal Jack
episodes.overview: Jack, Miltion, and Jerry team up to compete in a Commando Paintball Challenge, but Jack can't whip the guys into shape. When he gets an invitation to join the reigning champs from the South-hold Military Academy, he jumps at the opportunity. Meanwhile, Rudy helps Phil get over his fear of dentists.

episodes.name: Martinez & Malone: Mall Cops!
episodes.overview: When Jerry quits his job at the bowling alley, he joins Joan as a mall cop, but the two are faced with the unexpected when the mayor's son is captive. Meanwhile, Jack and Milton have a speed walking race at the park.

episodes.name: Seaford Hustle
episodes.overview: Milton fears his dreams of going to Oxbridge University are ruined until he meets Tom, the president of a powerful brotherhood that can help him. Meanwhile, Jack is mad at Jerry for ignoring a call from Kim that he was expecting.

episodes.name: Kickin It in the Office
episodes.overview: A documentary crew comes to film the dojo for a day, and Rudy takes advantage to make himself look good. Jack, angry that Rudy won't give him the sensei test, retaliates by convincing Rudy's grandmaster to fake being a fraud, demoting Rudy back to white belt. But Jack discovers that running the dojo is hard work. Meanwhile, after Jerry pranks him one time too many, Milton goes too far with pranks, not only on Jerry, but on the camera crew as well.

episodes.name: Bringing Down the House
episodes.overview: The gang accidentally infest a boys' club with termites, and need to raise $13,000 in order to pay to have the club fixed.

episodes.name: You Don't Know Jack
episodes.overview: When Jerry disrespects Jack’s authority as a sensei and throws an unauthorized party at the dojo, Jack suspends him from taking his black belt test.

episodes.name: The Grandmaster
episodes.overview: Kim returns from Japan with her sensei, Tomo, who’s interested in hiring Rudy for a position at the prestigious Otai.
